00014 {
00015     fprintf(stderr,"Verbose [%s]\n",msg);

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *out;
00031     long len;
00032     struct List *list;
00033  
00034     adfEnvInitDefault();
00035 
00036 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00037 
00038     /* mount existing device : OFS */
00039     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00040 
00041     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00042 
00043     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00044 
00045 
00046     /* write one file */
00047     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","w");
00048     if (!file) return 1;
00049     out = fopen( argv[2],"rb");
00050     if (!out) return 1;
00051     
00052     len = 600;
00053     n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00054     while(!feof(out)) {
00055         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00056         n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00057     }
00058     if (n>0)
00059         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00060 
00061     fclose(out);
00062 
00063     adfCloseFile(file);
00064 
00065     /* the directory */
00066     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00067     while(list) {
00068         printEntry(list->content);
00069         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00070         list = list->next;
00071     }
00072     freeList(list);
00073 
00074 
00075     /* re read this file */
00076     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","r");
00077     if (!file) return 1;
00078     out = fopen("moon__gif","wb");
00079     if (!out) return 1;
00080 
00081     len = 300;
00082     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00083     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00084         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00085         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00086     }
00087     if (n>0)
00088         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00089 
00090     fclose(out);
00091 
00092     adfCloseFile(file);
00093 
00094     adfUnMount(vol);
00095     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00096 
00097 
00098     adfEnvCleanUp();
00099 
00100     return 0;
00101 }
